law.catch_line: Attribution Of Members To A Primary Care Provider
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 224, Sec. 155 effective November 4, 2012.] To the maximum extent possible, carriers that offer any policy of accident and sickness insurance or any general or blanket policy of insurance shall attribute every member to a primary care provider. Members may change their primary care provider, provided that the member gives notice to the carrier.
